channel.title: Dds spec (x2) need help
channel.description:
The dds emote and spec is correct except for the fact it only hits once when uses special not two hits.
Its a 317 delta source.
Can someone tell me where to fix this and how?
EDIT: When I have a shield on it does the 2 specs but without the shield it doesnt help :confused:

item.title: Dds spec (x2) need help
item.dc:creator: @iLuckyBeaTz iLuckyBeaTz
item.description:
@iLuckyBeaTz wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24) // Dragon Dagger (s) { startAnimation(0x426); specialAtk(false, 0, 252, 0x426); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(0x426); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 25;

[code]{
if(hitTwice && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 5698 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4827 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 861){
DDS2Damg = true;
specialAtk(true, 25, 1062, 0x426);
DDS2Damg2 = true;
specGFX(1062);
usingSpecial = true;

}[/code]
